attributes.action: Amend the Act of Settlement which precludes marriage of a member of the royal family to a Roman Catholic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Amend the above act to make it possible for a member of the royal family to marry a Roman Catholic as this is wholly discriminatory as it applies only to members of the Roman Catholic Church and not to any other religious group christian or non christian or people with no religious belief. This petition does not seek to alter the position of the monarch
vis-a-vis of the anglican church or the requirement that the monarch be a member of the church of England.
